thread.title: Troy Price
thread.title_full: Grand Home Furnishings reviewed by Troy Price

author: Troy Price
title: Troy Price
text: ok i qwuess the couch was fine but it took 4 power loves seats to get a good 1 the first 3 the frame under had a broken piece the first 2 had cupholders whic looked like a child cut out they were not trimmed and we thought for a lazy boy this was unacceptable we almost gave up when we finally got a good 1 they brought a replacement out in cpl days cecked it was bad the 3rd anothjer week and 4th & final another week first delivery guys just dropped off didt tell us nothig all the next guys told us everything and even if the power goes out etc,,and the mgr was real helpfull though all this too
